body.p: The following mailing lists are both publicly available and provide web-based archives:

ul.li: MITgcm-support@mitgcm.org is our "catch-all" list. Please send any and all questions about the model and documentation to this address.
MITgcm-cvs@mitgcm.org is a "tracking" list meant mostly as a convenience for MITgcm developers. Posts to this list are automatically generated by commits to our CVS repository.

body.p:
A GForge-based MITgcm development server is available which includes:
a web-based "tracker" (or forum) suitable for quick bug reports or questions,
a list of on-going work by/for the developers, and
a Developer's HOWTO to help you get started with MITgcm development and customization.
